issue.title: FCD Ballot Comment US-161
issue.discussion: atomic_address has operator+= and operator-=, but no operator++ or operator--. The template specialization atomic<Ty*> has all of them.
issue.resolution: Add operator++(int) volatile, operator++(int), operator++() volatile, operator++(), operator--(int) volatile, operator--(int), operator--() volatile, and operator--() to atomic_address.
